# Copilot Instructions for CRM Scoring Widget

This is a minimal micro-frontend project for SAP Sales and Service Cloud V2.

## Project Type
Node.js Express backend + Vanilla JavaScript frontend (no framework)

## Key Features
- Single input field and slider for CustomScore (0-100)
- Dark theme (#00144a background)
- Auto-save on Enter, blur, slider release
- SAP Fiori styling
- Embedded as iframe in SAP CRM

## Setup Complete âœ…
All project files created and dependencies installed.

## Next Steps
1. Edit server/.env with your SAP CRM credentials
2. Run: npm run dev:server
3. Open: http://localhost:3000/?accountId=YOUR_ACCOUNT_UUID
